product_overview: Pumainca Restobar is a comprehensive digital management system designed to optimize the dining experience for customers and streamline operations for restaurant staff. It offers a modern progressive web app enabling customers to explore an interactive digital menu, place pickup orders, and reserve tables online, while providing administrators full control over orders, reservations, products, and site content in real time.
core_goals: Increase online orders by 40% within 6 months
Reduce phone order call volume by 60%
Develop a customer database to support future marketing
Ensure users can complete orders within 3 minutes
Provide 100% transparency in pricing and preparation times
Support access from all modern devices and browsers
key_features: Public Home Page with hero section, restaurant story, and editable content
Interactive digital Menu with filtering, search, detailed product views, and indicators for allergens and dietary preferences
Shopping cart with quantity adjustments, subtotal and tax calculations, and persistent storage
Streamlined Checkout process with validated forms, pickup time options, and payment method selection
Reservation system with date/time validation, availability checks, confirmation codes, and status tracking
Secure Admin Dashboard for managing orders, reservations, products, categories, and site content
Robust Authentication with Supabase for route protection
RESTful API routes handling products, categories, orders, reservations, and image uploads
Real-time updates and data caching with React Query
Responsive and accessible UI using Next.js, React, and Tailwind CSS
Smooth animations using Framer Motion and optimized image delivery via ImageKit
user_flow_summary: Customer browses home page and navigates to menu
Filters or searches menu items and views detailed product information
Adds items to shopping cart, modifies quantities, and reviews order
Completes checkout form with contact info, pickup time, and payment method
Submits order and receives confirmation with unique order number and estimated preparation time
Creates a table reservation by filling out form with validation and receives confirmation code via email
Administrators log in securely to access the admin dashboard
Admins manage orders by filtering, updating statuses, and canceling if needed
Admins manage reservations similarly with status controls and searches
Admins perform product and category CRUD operations, including image uploads and availability toggling
validation_criteria: Home page loads in under 2 seconds with responsive design and smooth animations
Menu shows at least 20 products with functional filtering and real-time search
Product detail pages display full info, gallery, and customization options without errors
Shopping cart updates quantities correctly, persists across sessions, and calculates subtotals and IGV correctly
Checkout form validates required fields with correct email and phone formats
Orders generate unique order numbers and trigger confirmation emails
Reservation form prevents past dates, validates time and availability, and sends confirmation codes via email
Admin dashboard and routes require authentication with expired sessions handled
Order and reservation management features support filtering, status updates, and modals without page reloads
Product CRUD supports image upload previews, validations, and quick availability toggling
API endpoints conform to REST conventions and return appropriate HTTP status codes
